flawed_nl_solution:
In total Liam has saved ($500/month * 12 months/year) * 2 years = $12000
When Liam pays his bills, he will have $12000 - $3500 = $<<12000-3500=850>>850 left
#### 850

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8500, not 850. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
